backend/main.mo: Main backend actor with user profiles, file metadata, transfer records, and AI processing results, using mixins for authorization and blob storage with access control enforced on all operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that FileTransfer.tsx should immediately reflect updated display names after profile setup without requiring page refresh.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and utilities with details about mobile optimization, authentication flow, and offline capabilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes, including sidebar and chart color definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with mobile viewport settings, PWA manifest, theme color, and app icons for iOS and Android.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, portrait orientation, and shortcuts to transfer, history, and users tabs.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first for static assets, network-first for API calls, cache versioning, and background sync for failed transfers.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router, authentication flow, profile setup check, onboarding tutorial, orientation lock, service worker registration, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AIFeatures.tsx: Provides AI-powered image compression and file recognition features with quality slider, preview, and share functionality. Uses canvas API for client-side image compression and displays results in collapsible sections.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavBar.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with four tabs (Transfer, History, Users, AI) that includes haptic feedback and safe area insets for mobile devices.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionStatus: Displays a fixed top banner showing online/offline connection status with auto-hide after reconnection and safe area support.
frontend/src/components/DashboardDownloa: Empty file placeholder for downloads tab component.
frontend/src/components/DashboardSentTab: Empty file placeholder for sent items tab component.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty state component displaying an image, title, description, and optional action button for empty views.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary class component that catches errors and displays a fallback UI with retry and home navigation options.
Bottom sheet context menu for file actions including download, share (using Web Share API), and delete with loading states.
frontend/src/components/FileTransfer.tsx: Main file transfer component handling file selection, upload progress, receiver selection, network validation, and transfer recording with support for prefilled files from AI compression.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright text with app branding.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with app logo, loading indicator, theme toggle, and menu button for authenticated users with safe area support.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen with Internet Identity authentication button, app branding, and loading state for unauthenticated users.
Empty file placeholder for mobile navigation drawer component.
frontend/src/components/NetworkWarningDi: Alert dialog component that warns users about uploading large files on slow or metered connections, displaying file size, connection type, and potential issues with options to cancel or proceed.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingTutori: Multi-slide onboarding tutorial dialog with touch swipe support, showing three feature slides (QR codes, file transfers, AI features) with navigation controls and skip functionality.
frontend/src/components/OnlineUsers.tsx: Displays a list of online users available for file sharing with avatars, display names, and online status badges, featuring pull-to-refresh and loading states.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form component that collects user display name and optional avatar URL, with keyboard handling and validation before saving to backend.
frontend/src/components/QRCodeDialog.tsx: Dialog that generates and displays a QR code for a session ID with countdown timer, expiry handling, and download functionality using the qrcode library.
frontend/src/components/QRScannerModal.t: Modal dialog that uses device camera to scan QR codes, parses session IDs from scanned data, and provides error handling with haptic feedback on successful scans.
frontend/src/components/ReceivedDownload: Displays a list of received file transfers with download buttons, file metadata (name, size, type, timestamp), and long-press context menu support for mobile interactions.
frontend/src/components/RecentlyReceived: Shows a card displaying the 5 most recently received files with download functionality, loading states, and an empty state when no files have been received.
frontend/src/components/SentDownloadsLis: Renders a list of files sent by the current user, showing receiver information, file metadata, download buttons, and long-press context menu support.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDownload: Settings section component that fetches and displays received files using ReceivedDownloadsList, with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonCard.tsx: Reusable skeleton loading placeholder component that displays a card with animated skeleton elements for file list items.
Main transfer history view with tabs for received/sent files, action buttons for sending/receiving files, QR scanner integration, and empty/loading states.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Defines application branding constants including app name, short name, acronym, and tagline for consistent branding across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, handling identity changes and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useHapticFeedback.ts: Custom hook providing haptic feedback functions (light, medium, success) using the Vibration API with feature detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useInstallPrompt.ts: Hook managing PWA installation prompt state and functionality, detecting if app is installable or already installed, and triggering the install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardHandler.ts: Custom hook that manages mobile keyboard interactions by scrolling inputs into view on focus, handling blur events, and dismissing keyboard when tapping outside input fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useLongPress.ts: Custom hook that detects long press gestures on touch and mouse events with configurable delay, providing event handlers for touch/mouse start, end, move, and leave.
frontend/src/hooks/useNetworkInfo.ts: Custom hook that monitors network connection quality using the Network Information API, detecting connection type, slow connections, metered networks, and data saver mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Custom hook that manages onboarding flow state using localStorage, tracking whether the user has completed onboarding and providing a function to mark it complete.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrientationLock.ts: Custom hook that manages screen orientation locking to portrait mode using the Screen Orientation API, with localStorage persistence and support detection.
frontend/src/hooks/usePullToRefresh.ts: Custom hook implementing pull-to-refresh functionality for mobile, tracking touch gestures and triggering refresh callback when pull distance exceeds threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, file uploads/downloads, transfers, AI processing, and file sharing with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequestIndicator.t: Custom hook that aggregates React Query fetching and mutation states to provide a single loading indicator for all ongoing requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeBack.ts: Custom hook that detects right swipe gestures from the left edge of the screen to trigger back navigation, commonly used for mobile navigation patterns.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebShare.ts: Custom hook that wraps the Web Share API to enable native file sharing on supported devices, converting Uint8Array blobs to shareable File objects.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color scheme for light/dark themes, safe area insets for mobile devices, and z-index layering system for modals and dialogs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for ICP authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard component with tab navigation (transfer, history, users, ai) that manages online status, handles URL-based tab routing, and coordinates file sharing between AI features and file transfer.
frontend/src/pages/MobileMenu.tsx: Mobile menu page with user profile display, navigation to profile settings, install app prompt, logout functionality, and swipe-back gesture support.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineDashboard.tsx: Empty file, likely a placeholder for offline dashboard functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile editing page allowing users to update display name and avatar URL, with orientation lock toggle, keyboard handling, and swipe-back navigation.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker for offline support and PWA functionality when the page loads.
Downloads transferred files by reading bytes from ExternalBlob and saving to device using the saveToDevice utility.
frontend/src/utils/fileSizeValidation.ts: Validates file sizes with warning at 10MB and error at 50MB, and provides file size formatting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/offlineSharePackage.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for offline sharing package functionality.
frontend/src/utils/qrPayload.ts: Encodes session IDs as deep-link URLs for QR codes and parses QR payloads to extract session IDs from URLs or raw strings.
frontend/src/utils/receivedDownloads.ts: Utilities for filtering transfer history by sender/receiver, detecting installable packages, and formatting file sizes and timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/saveToDevice.ts: Saves files to device using modern File System Access API with fallback to traditional download link approach.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Comprehensive URL parameter utilities supporting hash-based routing, sessionStorage persistence, and parameter extraction/clearing from URLs.
frontend/src/utils/useOnlineStatus.ts: React hook that tracks browser online/offline status using navigator.onLine and window events.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode support, custom color tokens (using CSS variables), extended theme utilities for safe-area viewport heights, accordion animations, and plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project state document describing OFS as an IC-based wireless file sharing app with Internet Identity auth, user profiles, file uploads, QR sharing, AI features, PWA/offline mode, and a Motoko backend storing data in-memory with role-based access control.
